attributes.action: Excllr Wendy M.Harbon[disabled] & Mr David M.C.Hughes[disabled]
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Prime Minister agree to included in the Welfare Reform Bill, that new assistance dog benefits be provided, to help provide funding for assistance dog's and animal's costs, over their training and work lives operational costs. That is the MoD as part of War Pension's Disability Benefit's, includes a military assistance dog benefit, which is payable to British Armed Forces service personnel, who are disabled. That is the DWP apart of DLA Benefit's, includes a civilian assistance dog benefit, which is payable to British civilian men and women, who are disabled equally.
attributes.creator_name: ExCllr Wendy M.Harbon[disabled] & Mr David M.C.Hughes[disabled]

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
